mapper.select:
SELECT FST_CNTR_DT AS CNTR_DT , RCNTR_DT AS RECNTR_DT , OG_ID , PRTNR_NO , MNG_CNT AS MNGT_ACC , VST_CNT AS VST_ACC , WRK_CNT AS FSH_ACC , (CASE WHEN VST_CNT > 0 THEN ROUND((WRK_CNT / VST_CNT) * 100, 1) ELSE 0 END) AS SVC_PROC FROM ( SELECT FST_CNTR_DT , RCNTR_DT , OG_ID , PRTNR_NO , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ AC201 WHERE MNGT_YM = SUBSTR(#{baseDateFrom},1, 6) AND AC201.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = M1.PRTNR_NO AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) MNG_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 WHERE ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{baseDateFrom},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = M1.PRTNR_NO AND VST_CNFMDT LIKE SUBSTR(#{baseDateFrom},1, 6)||'%' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) VST_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 WHERE ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{baseDateFrom},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = M1.PRTNR_NO AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL AND WK_EXCN_DT BETWEEN #{baseDateFrom} AND #{baseDateTo} ) WRK_CNT FROM ( SELECT FST_CNTR_DT , RCNTR_DT , OG_ID , PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(#{baseDateFrom},1, 6) AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} UNION ALL
SELECT FST_CNTR_DT , RCNTR_DT , OG_ID , PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE( SUBSTR(#{baseDateFrom},1, 6), 'YYYYMM'),-1), 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T1.CLTN_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM')||'%' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} ) M1 )

SELECT VST_CNFMDT AS VST_DT , MAX(VST_CNFM_HH) AS VST_TM , MAX(CST_KNM) AS CST_NM , CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , MAX(PDCT_PD_CD) AS PDCT_CD , MAX(PD_NM) AS GOODS_NM , MAX(CASE WHEN RN = 1 THEN PART_NM ELSE '' END) AS PU_PART1 , MAX(CASE WHEN RN = 2 THEN PART_NM ELSE '' END) AS PU_PART2 , MAX(CASE WHEN RN = 3 THEN PART_NM ELSE '' END) AS PU_PART3 , MAX(CASE WHEN RN = 4 THEN PART_NM ELSE '' END) AS PU_PART4 , MAX(CASE WHEN RN = 5 THEN PART_NM ELSE '' END) AS PU_PART5 , MAX(CASE WHEN RN = 6 THEN PART_NM ELSE '' END) AS PU_PART6 , MAX(CRAL_LOCARA_TNO) AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , MAX(MEXNO_ENCR) AS MEXNO_ENCR , MAX(CRAL_IDV_TNO) AS CRAL_IDV_TNO , MAX(IST_YM) AS IST_YM , MAX(CNTR_NMN_N) AS CNTR_NMN_N , MAX(STPL_PTRM) AS STPL_PTRM , MAX(FNL_AMT) AS FNL_AMT , MAX(SV_HSHD_CNT) AS SV_HSHD_CNT FROM ( SELECT VST_CNFMDT , VST_CNFM_HH , T2.CST_KNM , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC251.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , T2.MEXNO_ENCR , T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO , PU_PART_PD_CD , F2.PD_NM AS PART_NM , SUBSTR(T4.IST_DT,0,6) AS IST_YM -- 설치년월 , T4.CNTR_NMN_N-- 사용차월 , T3.STPL_PTRM -- 약정기간 , T3.FNL_AMT -- 렌탈료 , T5.CNT AS SV_HSHD_CNT -- 사용계정수 , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AC261.VST_CNFMDT, AC261.CNTR_NO, AC251.PDCT_PD_CD ORDER BY PU_PART_PD_CD) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ AC251 ON AC251.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = T2.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T3 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T4 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SV_HSHD_NO , COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ A WHERE REQD_DT IS NULL AND A.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD NOT LIKE '401%' GROUP BY SV_HSHD_NO ) T5 ON T4.SV_HSHD_NO = T5.SV_HSHD_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON AC251.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ F1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = F1.CNTR_NO AND F1.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{baseDateFrom},1, 6) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS F2 ON PU_PART_PD_CD = F2.PD_CD WHERE AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{baseDateFrom},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} AND AC261.WK_EXCN_DT BETWEEN #{baseDateFrom} AND #{baseDateTo} AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' --AND F2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) GROUP BY VST_CNFMDT , CNTR_NO

SELECT '담당자 / 설치자명'|| CHR(10)||'예정시간 / 완료시간' AS WEEK_GUBUN , MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUN = 'A' AND VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay1} THEN PRTNR_KNM ||'|'||CST_KNM||CHR(10)|| '예정'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,3,2) ||'|' ||'완료' || DECODE(VST_FSH_HH, null, '', SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,3,2)) ELSE '' END) AS BS_WEEK_DAY1 , MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUN = 'B' AND VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay2} THEN PRTNR_KNM ||'|'||CST_KNM||CHR(10)|| '예정'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,3,2) ||'|' ||'완료' || DECODE(VST_FSH_HH, null, '', SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,3,2)) ELSE '' END) AS BS_WEEK_DAY2 , MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUN = 'C' AND VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay3} THEN PRTNR_KNM ||'|'||CST_KNM||CHR(10)|| '예정'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,3,2) ||'|' ||'완료' || DECODE(VST_FSH_HH, null, '', SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,3,2)) ELSE '' END) AS BS_WEEK_DAY3 , MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUN = 'D' AND VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay4} THEN PRTNR_KNM ||'|'||CST_KNM||CHR(10)|| '예정'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,3,2) ||'|' ||'완료' || DECODE(VST_FSH_HH, null, '', SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,3,2)) ELSE '' END) AS BS_WEEK_DAY4 , MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUN = 'E' AND VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay5} THEN PRTNR_KNM ||'|'||CST_KNM||CHR(10)|| '예정'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,3,2) ||'|' ||'완료' || DECODE(VST_FSH_HH, null, '', SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,3,2)) ELSE '' END) AS BS_WEEK_DAY5 , MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUN = 'F' AND VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay6} THEN PRTNR_KNM ||'|'||CST_KNM||CHR(10)|| '예정'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,3,2) ||'|' ||'완료' || DECODE(VST_FSH_HH, null, '', SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,3,2)) ELSE '' END) AS BS_WEEK_DAY6 , MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUN = 'G' AND VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay7} THEN PRTNR_KNM ||'|'||CST_KNM||CHR(10)|| '예정'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_CNFM_HH,3,2) ||'|' ||'완료' || DECODE(VST_FSH_HH, null, '', SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(VST_FSH_HH,3,2)) ELSE '' END) AS BS_WEEK_DAY7 FROM ( SELECT 'A' AS GUBUN , VST_CNFMDT , VST_CNFM_HH , T2.CST_KNM , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC251.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , PRTNR_KNM , VST_FSH_HH , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, VST_CNFMDT ORDER BY VST_CNFM_HH) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ AC251 ON AC251.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = T2.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON AC251.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ F1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = F1.CNTR_NO AND F1.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay1},1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS F2 ON PU_PART_PD_CD = F2.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS F3 ON F3.PRTNR_NO = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND F3.OG_TP_CD = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ VS106 ON AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS106.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay1},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} AND AC261.VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay1} AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND F2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'B' AS GUBUN , VST_CNFMDT , VST_CNFM_HH , T2.CST_KNM , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC251.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , PRTNR_KNM , VST_FSH_HH , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, VST_CNFMDT ORDER BY VST_CNFM_HH) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ AC251 ON AC251.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = T2.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON AC251.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ F1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = F1.CNTR_NO AND F1.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay2},1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS F2 ON PU_PART_PD_CD = F2.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS F3 ON F3.PRTNR_NO = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND F3.OG_TP_CD = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ VS106 ON AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS106.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay2},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} AND AC261.VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay2} AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND F2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'C' AS GUBUN , VST_CNFMDT , VST_CNFM_HH , T2.CST_KNM , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC251.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , PRTNR_KNM , VST_FSH_HH , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, VST_CNFMDT ORDER BY VST_CNFM_HH) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ AC251 ON AC251.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = T2.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON AC251.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ F1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = F1.CNTR_NO AND F1.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay3},1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS F2 ON PU_PART_PD_CD = F2.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS F3 ON F3.PRTNR_NO = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND F3.OG_TP_CD = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ VS106 ON AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS106.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay3},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} AND AC261.VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay3} AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND F2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'D' AS GUBUN , VST_CNFMDT , VST_CNFM_HH , T2.CST_KNM , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC251.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , PRTNR_KNM , VST_FSH_HH , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, VST_CNFMDT ORDER BY VST_CNFM_HH) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ AC251 ON AC251.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = T2.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON AC251.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ F1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = F1.CNTR_NO AND F1.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay4},1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS F2 ON PU_PART_PD_CD = F2.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS F3 ON F3.PRTNR_NO = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND F3.OG_TP_CD = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ VS106 ON AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS106.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay4},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} AND AC261.VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay4} AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND F2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL
SELECT 'E' AS GUBUN , VST_CNFMDT , VST_CNFM_HH , T2.CST_KNM , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC251.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , PRTNR_KNM , VST_FSH_HH
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, VST_CNFMDT ORDER BY VST_CNFM_HH) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ AC251 ON AC251.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = T2.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON AC251.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ F1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = F1.CNTR_NO AND F1.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay5},1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS F2 ON PU_PART_PD_CD = F2.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS F3 ON F3.PRTNR_NO = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND F3.OG_TP_CD = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ VS106 ON AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS106.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay5},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} AND AC261.VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay5} AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND F2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'F' AS GUBUN , VST_CNFMDT , VST_CNFM_HH , T2.CST_KNM , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC251.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , PRTNR_KNM , VST_FSH_HH
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, VST_CNFMDT ORDER BY VST_CNFM_HH) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ AC251 ON AC251.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = T2.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON AC251.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ F1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = F1.CNTR_NO AND F1.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay6},1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS F2 ON PU_PART_PD_CD = F2.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS F3 ON F3.PRTNR_NO = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND F3.OG_TP_CD = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ VS106 ON AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS106.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay6},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} AND AC261.VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay6} AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND F2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'G' AS GUBUN , VST_CNFMDT , VST_CNFM_HH , T2.CST_KNM , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC251.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , PRTNR_KNM , VST_FSH_HH
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, VST_CNFMDT ORDER BY VST_CNFM_HH) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ AC251 ON AC251.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = T2.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON AC251.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ F1 ON AC261.CNTR_NO = F1.CNTR_NO AND F1.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay7},1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS F2 ON PU_PART_PD_CD = F2.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS F3 ON F3.PRTNR_NO = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND F3.OG_TP_CD = CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ VS106 ON AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS106.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = SUBSTR(#{weekDay7},1, 6) AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{fxnPrtnrNo} AND AC261.VST_CNFMDT = #{weekDay7} AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND F2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) GROUP BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, RN ORDER BY CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO, RN
